title: Nightshade
description:
I wanted him to kiss me - wished he could smellthe desire that I knew was pouring off me.You can't, Calla. This boy isn't the one for you.Calla Tor has always known her destiny: graduation, marriage and then a life leading her pack.But when she defied her masters' law to save a human boy she must choose. Is one boy worth losing everything?
A Seductive, twister world where humans are pawns to a powerful pack of werewolves, and nothing is what it seems'- Becca Fitzpatrick'Filled with love, lust, action, suspense, and mayhem, NIGHTSHADE is a glittering dark gem'- Cynthia Leitich Smith
author: Andrea Cremer
